movies.title: Inception
movies.description: Inception is a science fiction action thriller film about a skilled thief, Dom Cobb (Leonardo DiCaprio), who steals information from people's dreams by infiltrating their subconscious. He's hired for a reverse task: planting an idea into the mind of a powerful business rival, instead of extracting information. This involves entering multiple layers of dreams within dreams, creating a complex and surreal world where reality blurs with the subconscious.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman battles the Joker, a criminal mastermind bent on chaos.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A group of astronauts travels through a wormhole in search of a new home for humanity.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.description: A hacker discovers the world he lives in is a simulated reality.

movies.title: Parasite
movies.description: A poor family's scheme to infiltrate a wealthy household takes a dark turn.
